Positive: This design would be placed over the central bolt of the climbing hold taking advantage of all surrounding space in the cavity of the climbing hold and providing a secure connection to the climbing hold
Minus: Although this design would use all the surrounding space inside the climbing hold, its shape is irregular and electronic parts would not fit in certain sections being an inefficient use of space
Improvement: Redesign the housing to be space efficient and have a secure connection to the central bolt of the climbing hold
